actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the rules of the House of Representatives to provide for the wide-angle broadcast of the entire House Chamber on a uniform and regular basis throughout each day's proceedings.

summary.text: Amends rule I of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that broadcasts of congressional proceedings include: (1) frequent, visual wide-angle coverage of the entire House Chamber on a uniform and regular basis when the House is in session; (2) Chamber coverage while Members are voting; and (3) periodic visual presentation of the running vote tally.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the rules of the House of Representatives to provide for the wide-angle broadcast of the entire House Chamber on a uniform and regular basis throughout each day's proceedings.
